      public Controller()

  • Method Details

    • testCase

      public void testCase()
      This method is to help me to buy something and it would not be necessary to register a product or a user.

    • createUser

      public boolean createUser(int userType, String name, String cc, Calendar date)
      This method is used to create a user.
      Parameters:
      userType - The type of the user (regular or premium).
      name - The name of the user.
      cc - The credit card number of the user.
      date - The date of user creation (Calendar or Instant).
      Returns:
      Returns false if the user could not be created.

    • registerBook

      public boolean registerBook(String id, String nameBP, int numPages, int dayB, int monthB, int yearB, String URL, int acumReadPages, String reviewShort, int genderIndex, double sellingValue, int numCopies)
      This method is used to create a new book.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the book.
      nameBP - The name of the book.
      numPages - The number of pages in the book.
      dayB - The day of publication.
      monthB - The month of publication.
      yearB - The year of publication.
      URL - The URL of the book.
      acumReadPages - The accumulated number of pages read.
      reviewShort - The short review of the book.
      genderIndex - The index of the book's gender (SCIENCE_FICTION, FANTASY, HISTORICAL_NOVEL).
      sellingValue - The selling value of the book.
      numCopies - The number of copies of the book.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the book was successfully registered, false otherwise.

    • registerMagazine

      public boolean registerMagazine(String id, String nameBP, int numPages, int dayM, int monthM, int yearM, String URL, int acumReadPages, int categoryIndex, double valueSuscription, String emissionPeriod, int numSuscription)
      This method is used to create a new magazine.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the magazine.
      nameBP - The name of the magazine.
      numPages - The number of pages in the magazine.
      dayM - The day of publication.
      monthM - The month of publication.
      yearM - The year of publication.
      URL - The URL of the magazine.
      acumReadPages - The accumulated number of pages read.
      categoryIndex - The index of the magazine category.
      valueSuscription - The value of the magazine subscription.
      emissionPeriod - The emission period of the magazine.
      numSuscription - The number of subscriptions for the magazine.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the magazine was successfully registered, false otherwise.

    • modifyBook

      public boolean modifyBook(int optionModify, String idBModify, String nameBPModify, int numPagesModify, int dayBModify, int monthBModify, int yearBModify, String URLModify, int acumReadPagesModify, String reviewShortModify, int genderIndexModify, double sellingValueModify, int numCopiesModify)
      This method modifies the book completely
      Parameters:
      optionModify - The option to modify.
      idBModify - The ID of the book to modify.
      nameBPModify - The modified name of the book.
      numPagesModify - The modified number of pages in the book.
      dayBModify - The modified day of publication.
      monthBModify - The modified month of publication.
      yearBModify - The modified year of publication.
      URLModify - The modified URL of the book.
      acumReadPagesModify - The modified accumulated number of pages read.
      reviewShortModify - The modified short review of the book.
      genderIndexModify - The modified index of the book's gender (SCIENCE_FICTION, FANTASY, HISTORICAL_NOVEL).
      sellingValueModify - The modified selling value of the book.
      numCopiesModify - The modified number of copies of the book.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the book was successfully modified.

    • modifyMagazine

      public boolean modifyMagazine(int optionMModify, String idMModify, String namePBModify, int numPagesModify, int dayMModify, int monthMModify, int yearMModify, String URLModify, int acumReadPagesModify, int categoryIndexModify, double valueSubscriptionModify, String emissionPeriodModify, int numSubscriptionModify)
      This method modifies the magazine completely
      Parameters:
      optionMModify - The option to modify.
      idMModify - The ID of the magazine to modify.
      namePBModify - The modified name of the magazine.
      numPagesModify - The modified number of pages in the magazine.
      dayMModify - The modified day of publication.
      monthMModify - The modified month of publication.
      yearMModify - The modified year of publication.
      URLModify - The modified URL of the magazine.
      acumReadPagesModify - The modified accumulated number of pages read.
      categoryIndexModify - The modified index of the magazine category.
      valueSubscriptionModify - The modified value of the magazine subscription.
      emissionPeriodModify - The modified emission period of the magazine.
      numSubscriptionModify - The modified number of subscriptions for the magazine.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the magazine was successfully modified.

    • deleteBook

      public boolean deleteBook(String idB)
      This method delete a book with the specified ID.
      Parameters:
      idB - The ID of the book to delete.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the book was successfully deleted, false otherwise.

    • deleteMagazine

      public boolean deleteMagazine(String idM)
      This method delete a magazine with the specified ID.
      Parameters:
      idM - The ID of the magazine to delete.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the magazine was successfully deleted, false otherwise.

    • buyOrSubscribe

      public void buyOrSubscribe(String ccUser, String idBP)
      This method allows the user with his ID to buy a book or subscribe to a magazine.
      Parameters:
      ccUser - The ID number of the user.
      idBP - The ID of the bibliographic product to buy or subscribe to.

    • viewLibrary

      public String viewLibrary(String ccUser)
      This method retrieves the list of products in the user's library.
      Parameters:
      ccUser - The ID number of the user.
      Returns:
      Returns a string representation of the user's library.

    • viewMagazineSubscribe

      public String viewMagazineSubscribe(String ccUser)
      This method retrieves the list of subscribed magazines for a user.
      Parameters:
      ccUser - The ID number of the user.
      Returns:
      Returns a string representation of the user's subscribed magazines.

    • cancelSubs

      public boolean cancelSubs(String ccUser, String idBP)
      This method allows the user to cancel the subscription to a magazine
      Parameters:
      ccUser - The ID number of the user.
      idBP - The ID of the bibliographic product to cancel the subscription for.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the subscription was successfully canceled, false otherwise.

      public String getProducts()
      Retrieves the list of all bibliographic products.
      Returns:
      Returns a string representation of all bibliographic products.

      Retrieves the list of books among all bibliographic products.
      Returns:
      Returns a string representation of all books.

      public String getBPMagazine()
      Retrieves the list of magazines among all bibliographic products.
      Returns:
      Returns a string representation of all magazines.

      Retrieves the list of premium users among all users.
      Returns:
      Returns a string representation of all premium users.

      month - The month.
      year - The year.

    • verifyBook

      public boolean verifyBook(String idBP)
      Verifies if a bibliographic product is a book.
      Parameters:
      idBP - The ID of the bibliographic product.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the bibliographic product is a book, false otherwise.

    • verifyMagazine

      public boolean verifyMagazine(String idBP)
      Verifies if a bibliographic product is a magazine.
      Parameters:
      idBP - The ID of the bibliographic product.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the bibliographic product is a magazine, false otherwise.

    • getBibliographicProduct

      public BibliographicProducts getBibliographicProduct(String idBP)
      Retrieves a bibliographic product by its ID.
      Parameters:
      idBP - The ID of the bibliographic product.
      Returns:
      Returns the bibliographic product matching the specified ID, or null if not found.

    • searchUser

      public int searchUser(String ccUser)
      Searches for a user by their credit card number.
      Parameters:
      ccUser - The ID number of the user.
      Returns:
      Returns the index of the user in the user list, or -1 if not found.

    • typeUser

      public boolean typeUser(String ccUser)
      Determines the type of user based on their credit card number.
      Parameters:
      ccUser - The ID number of the user.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the user is a regular user, false if the user is a premium user or not found.

    • typeProducts

      public boolean typeProducts(String idBP)
      Determines the type of bibliographic product based on its ID.
      Parameters:
      idBP - The ID of the bibliographic product.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the bibliographic product is a book, false if it's a magazine or not found.

    • searchBP

      public int searchBP(String idProduct)
      Searches for a bibliographic product by its ID.
      Parameters:
      idProduct - The ID of the bibliographic product.
      Returns:
      Returns the index of the product in the list of all bibliographic products, or -1 if not found.

    • numPagesReadBook

      public int numPagesReadBook()
      Calculates the total number of pages read in books by all users.
      Returns:
      Returns the total number of pages read in books.

    • numPagesReadMagazine

      public int numPagesReadMagazine()
      Calculates the total number of pages read in magazines by all users.
      Returns:
      Returns the total number of pages read in magazines.

    • showMostReadGenresAndCategories

      public void showMostReadGenresAndCategories()
      Displays the most read genres for books and categories for magazines by users. It shows the most read book genre, the number of pages read for books, the most read magazine category, and the number of pages read for magazines.

    • sellingBooks

      public String sellingBooks()
      Calculates the number of books sold and their total value by genre.
      Returns:
      Returns a formatted message containing the number of books sold and their total value by genre.

    • numSubsActiveValueTotal

      public String numSubsActiveValueTotal()
      Calculates the number of active subscriptions and their total value by magazine category.
      Returns:
      Returns a formatted message containing the number of active subscriptions and their total value by category.

    • changeFormat

      public String changeFormat(Calendar date)
      Converts a Calendar object to a formatted date string.
      Parameters:
      date - The Calendar object representing the date.
      Returns:
      Returns the formatted date string.

    • identificarProducto

      public String identificarProducto(String ccUser, int fila, int columna)
      Identifies a bibliographic product by its position in a user's list.
      Parameters:
      ccUser - The credit card number of the user.
      row - The row position of the product in the user's list.
      column - The column position of the product in the user's list.
      Returns:
      Returns the identified bibliographic product as a string.

    • cantidadPaginas

      public int cantidadPaginas(String ccUser, int fila, int columna)
      Retrieves the number of pages of a bibliographic product.
      Parameters:
      identificarProducto - The identifier of the bibliographic product.
      Returns:
      Returns the number of pages of the product.

      public String nombreProductoBibliografico(String identificarProducto)

      Returns:
